properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 10 at 9:39PM EST until January 14 at 3:00AM EST by NWS Cleveland OH
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Cleveland has issued a flood
warning for the following rivers in Ohio...

Portage River At Woodville
Sandusky River Above Fremont
Sandusky River At Tiffin
Huron River Near Milan
Blanchard River Near Findlay
Maumee River Near Grand Rapids
Maumee River At Waterville
Scioto River Near Larue
Scioto River Near Prospect
Eagle Creek Above Findlay

The National Weather Service in Cleveland has issued a

* Flood Warning for
The Maumee River Near Grand Rapids
* from Sunday afternoon to late Monday night.
* There is no current observed data.
* Flood stage is 17.5 feet.
* The river is forecast to rise above flood stage by Sunday afternoon
and continue to rise to near 17.7 feet by Sunday evening.The river
will fall below flood stage by Monday afternoon.
* At 18.0 feet...Water starts to cover Front Street just west of the
Grand Rapids business district over portions of Beaver, West, and
Mill Streets. Campgrounds along the river are under water.
properties.instruction:
Never drive your car through flooded roadways. The water may be
deeper than it appears. Turn around...don't drown!

Stay tuned to NOAA weather radio and other local media for further
details and updates.
